Function: Enables tracking through any turrets on the grid. Disables raycast tracking.
Fires a raycast scan and enables raycast tracking if a target is hit. Disables turret tracking.
Enables gyro control for the aimbot only while tracking is active
Disables gyro control for the aimbot
Toggles gyro control for the aimbot
Sets the aimbot lead tracking for missiles
Sets the aimbot lead tracking for gatling guns
Sets the aimbot lead tracking to a projectile muzzle velocity of XXX (Should be an integer value in m/s)
